name: Tasker
description:
I was having trouble focusing on my studying. So I coded this simple app!

It asks you for a task, and it's duration. And tracks how many tasks you completed!

You can even listen to some relaxing rain or fireplace sounds while doing your task.

I hope this would be useful to you.

If you are interested in the source code, it's available here: https://github.com/UseCondomsKid/Tasker
